passage_text: French Meaning: The name Lucien is a French baby name. In French the meaning of the name Lucien is: Form of Luke. 'Light; illumination. American Meaning: The name Lucien is an American baby name. In American the meaning of the name Lucien is: Form of Luke. 'Light; illumination. Latin Meaning: The name Lucien is a Latin baby name. In Latin the meaning of the name Lucien is: From the Latin 'Lucianus'.

Lucien is a somewhat prominent first name for men (#844 out of 1220, Top 69%) and an even more prominent last name for all people (#21192 out of 150436, Top 14%). (2000 U.S. Census). Presented below is the birth name popularity of Lucien for boys.

Lucien /lu-cien/ [2 sylls.] as a name for boys is of Latin and Greek derivation, and the name Lucien means light; from Lucanus. Lucien is a version of Lucian (Latin): form of Lucius. Lucien is also a variant of Luke (Greek). Kreatif forms: Lacien, Lecien, Leycien.
Meanings and history of the name Lucien: | Edit. Lucien is a male given name of French origin, meaning light. It is the French form of Luciano or Latin Lucianus, patronymic of Lucius.
